/**
 * Web fonts
 ============================================================================ */
/* Override Font Awesome classes. */
.fa-border {
  border: solid 1px;
  border-radius: 3px;
}

/* Hide in-content icons if Font Awesome fails to load. */
.fa-loading .fa,
.fa-unavailable .fa {
  display: none;
}

/* Web font smoothing */
:after,
:before {
  text-rendering: auto;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}
/*# sourceMappingURL=webfonts.css.map */
